quotes.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
Music can change the world because it can change people.
Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
Some people have lives; some people have music.
Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
If I were to begin life again, I would devote it to music. It is the only cheap and unpunished rapture upon earth.
If in the after life there is not music, we will have to import it.
Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
Do you know that our soul is composed of harmony?
One reason music is more effective than antidepressants is because if you listen close enough you might feel God telling you everything is going to be okay.
The piano is a divinely inspired instrument, a mirror held up to its player's soul that captures the light and shadow of the performer and reflects them back to the listener.
I've never known a musician who regretted being one. Whatever deceptions life may have in store for you, music itself is not going to let you down.
Without music, life would be a blank to me.
Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
If I had my life to live over again, I would have made a rule to read some poetry and listen to some music at least once every week.
There is nothing in the world so much like prayer as music is.
Music produces a kind of pleasure which human nature cannot do without.
Music is to me like breathing. I don't get tired of breathing, I don't get tire of music!
What we play is life.
Music is by far the most wonderful method we have to remind us each day of the power of personal accomplishment.
After silence that which comes nearest to expressing the inexpressible is music.
Life is like music; it must be composed by ear, feeling, and instinct, not by rule.
Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
Without music, life is a journey through a desert.
Life can't be all bad when for ten dollars you can buy all the Beethoven sonatas and listen to them for ten years.
